description: Numerators of expansion of exp x / sin x.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
maple: c:= proc(m) option remember;  1/(m+1)! - add((-1)^i/(2*i+1)!*c(m-2*i),i=1..floor((m+1)/2))end proc;c(-1):= 1;A007418:= numer @ c; # _Robert Israel_, Apr 13 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
